verbose_text: In contrast, a significantly increased expression of p40 2'5'OAS transcripts was observed in Leydig cells exposed to either poly I : C or IFN alpha for 16 h. MxA mRNA expression was also significantly enhanced in response to IFN alpha and was marginally stimulated by poly I : C.
evidence: IFN alpha for 16 h. MxA mRNA expression was also significantly enhanced in response to IFN alpha and was marginally stimulated by poly I:C
